thread.title: Sea Horse Ranch Luxury Resort Offers Fall Special Savings For Travel To Cabarete, Dominican Republic
thread.title_full: Sea Horse Ranch Luxury Resort Offers Fall Special Savings For Travel To Cabarete, Dominican Republic

title: Sea Horse Ranch Luxury Resort Offers Fall Special Savings For Travel To Cabarete, Dominican Republic
text: Sea Horse Ranch Luxury Resort Offers Fall Special Savings For Travel To Cabarete, Dominican Republic By PR Newswire | 07/22/15 - 01:13 PM EDT Reprint CABARETE, Dominican Republic , July 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The Dominican Republic is consistently ranked among the top vacation destinations in the Caribbean by the travel industry, with its famous beaches among the most popular with travelers from around the world. Sea Horse Ranch Luxury Resort, located on the Caribbean island's North Coast is an exclusive oceanfront villa resort which is world renowned for its elegance, privacy, comfort, natural beauty, and service. Situated near the town of Cabarete, and only a 15 minute drive from the international airport of Puerto Plata, Sea Horse Ranch features 250 acres of sprawling grounds with lush tropical gardens, and exclusive amenities such as ocean front pools within a grotto cove, a Tennis Club with five clay courts, an Equestrian Center and one of the North Coast's best seaside gourmet restaurants, The Beach Club. The Dominican Republic , known for its signature hospitality, offers one of the most historic and culturally rich destinations in the Caribbean with many options to explore throughout the country, such as the old Victorian city of Puerto Plata, the beautiful beach towns of Cabarete and Sosua which offer numerous international restaurants and water sport activities, the Colonial Zone of Santo Domingo (a UNESCO World Heritage Site), whale watching in the Samana peninsula, and superb award-winning golf courses. Whether you choose to explore the area, or relax in the comfort of your villa at Sea Horse Ranch, the lush surroundings of the island will captivate and inspire you. 1 of 2
